title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Certificates of
participation shall, for the purposes of this Part, refer to any certificates
or similar instruments representing an undivided proportionate interest in
lease, installment or other periodic payments to be made by any State
department or agency. (b) COPS
shall mean certificates of participation, as defined by subdivision (a) of this
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
107.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
